mapper.insert: insert into tbl_auction_times (id, bs_id,station_real_code, station_code, local_auction_id, auction_times, start_auction_time, end_auction_time, num, enable, remarks) values (#{id},#{bsId}, #{stationRealCode}, #{stationCode}, #{localAuctionId}, #{auctionTimes}, #{startAuctionTime}, #{endAuctionTime}, #{num}, #{enable}, #{remarks})
mapper.update:
update tbl_auction_times
bs_id = #{bsId},
station_real_code = #{stationRealCode},
station_code = #{stationCode},
local_auction_id = #{localAuctionId},
auction_times = #{auctionTimes},
start_auction_time = #{startAuctionTime},
end_auction_time = #{endAuctionTime},
num = #{num},
enable = #{enable},
remarks = #{remarks},
where id = #{id}
